emissions.explanation: Coconut milk is a high-emission ingredient due to its production process.
Green curry paste is a processed ingredient with significant emissions.
Chicken stock is a liquid derived from chicken, with lower emissions than whole chicken.
Chicken thighs are a common poultry cut with moderate emissions.
emissions.ingredient: Chicken, leg, flesh and skin, raw

emissions.explanation: Brown sugar has a moderate emission factor due to its processing.
Fish sauce is a fermented product with significant emissions.
Canned bamboo shoots are processed and have moderate emissions.
Fresh basil has low emissions compared to dried herbs.
Red bell pepper has moderate emissions as a fresh vegetable.
Jasmine rice is a staple grain with higher emissions than some other rice forms.
